text: 19:18 Matyu 5:43; 19:19; 22:39; Mak 12:31; Luk 10:27; Rom 13:9; Galesia 5:14; Jems 2:8Nɨn namakatam arazir kuratam nɨ damightɨ, nɨ an arazim ikarvaghan markɨ, egh nɨ an ataran markɨ. Nɨ uabɨra uabɨ gifongezɨ moghɨn, nɨ gumazamizir igharazibagh ifongegh. Kɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God, kɨ kamaghɨn mɨkemegha gɨfa.
